schemes.pageHeaderDescription: Find and learn about relevant government schemes.
schemes.pageDescription: Ask me anything about farming, schemes, or market prices.
schemes.assistantDescription: Ask a question below to get instant information and advice.
schemes.welcomeMessage: Hello! How can I help you today? You can ask about government schemes, crop advice, or anything else related to farming.
schemes.pmkisan.title: PM-KISAN Scheme
schemes.pmkisan.description: Provides income support of â‚¹6,000 per year to all landholding farmer families.
schemes.subsidy.title: Agricultural Mechanization Subsidy
schemes.subsidy.description: Subsidy on the purchase of various agricultural machinery like tractors and rotavators.
schemes.pmksy.title: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana
schemes.pmksy.description: Aims to enhance water use efficiency through micro-irrigation systems like drips and sprinklers.
schemes.solar.title: PM-KUSUM Scheme
schemes.solar.description: Promotes the use of solar pumps and solar power generation on barren lands.
schemes.eligibility.dialogDesc: Enter your details to check your potential eligibility for this scheme.

schemes.error.apiDesc: Could not check eligibility at this time. Please try again later.

organics.pageDescription: Resources and information to help you transition to organic farming.
organics.certDesc: Learn about the process and benefits of organic certification.
organics.soilDesc: Techniques for building and maintaining rich, fertile soil without chemicals.
organics.marketDesc: Find local and national markets for your organic produce.
organics.faq1q: How long does the transition to organic farming take?
organics.faq1a: The transition period is typically three years for perennial crops and two years for annual crops. During this time, you must follow organic practices but cannot sell your products as 'certified organic.'
organics.faq2a: Initial costs can be higher due to certification fees and potentially lower yields at the start. However, many farmers find it becomes more profitable over time due to lower input costs (no synthetic fertilizers/pesticides) and premium prices for organic produce.
organics.faq3a: The main challenges include effective pest and weed control without chemicals, managing soil fertility, and a potential dip in yield during the initial transition years.
organics.faq4q: Where can I get organic seeds?
organics.faq4a: Organic seeds can be sourced from certified organic seed producers, agricultural universities, and various government and non-government organizations that promote organic farming.
customerSupport.pageDescription: Get instant help by calling our AI-powered support line.
customerSupport.title: AI Customer Support Hotline
customerSupport.description: Our AI assistant is available 24/7 to answer your questions. Call the number below to get started.
customerSupport.callTimings: Available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
customerSupport.whatToExpect.title: What to expect when you call:
customerSupport.whatToExpect.li1: An AI assistant will answer your call.
customerSupport.whatToExpect.li2: You can ask for Mandi prices, weather updates, and scheme information.
customerSupport.whatToExpect.li3: Use the keypad to navigate menus or just speak your query.
